{"id":1250641660,"question_id":3384,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 4 weeks","timestamp":1714979283,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"82 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1250641660/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Number of Operations to Make Word K-Periodic","memory":"29.4 MB","code":"\n\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    int minimumOperationsToMakeKPeriodic(string word, int k) {\n        unordered_map<string, int> freqMap;\n        for (int i = 0; i < word.size(); i += k) {\n            freqMap[word.substr(i, k)]++;\n        }\n        int maxFreq = 0;\n        for (auto entry : freqMap) {\n            maxFreq = max(maxFreq, entry.second);\n        }\n        return (word.size() / k) - maxFreq;\n    }\n};\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-number-of-operations-to-make-word-k-periodic","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
